comments:
Hello,

My cubes work fine at design time, but at runtime when running from the API, I get ....

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/birt/data/engine/olap/api/ICubeCursor
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.adapter.api.DataAdapterUtil.registerJSObject(DataAdapterUtil.java:52)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.setResultSets(ExecutionContext.java:1694)

	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.l18n.LocalizedReportItemExecutor.execute(LocalizedReportItemExecutor.java:36)

I see that there's no ICubeCursor class in the BIRT runtime lib directory.  So I tried copying in org.eclipse.birt.data_2.2.0.v20070510-0630.jar from plugins into my lib directory, but then I get...
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.api.query.impl.CubeCursorImpl


This is a show stopper for me.
Thanks.
